title: mondaysRmurder Episode 1: The Colonial Parkway Murders
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Thanks for your interest in the Colonial Parkway Murders. If you are interested in learning more about the case, please feel free to check out the Colonial Parkway Murders page on Facebook, where we discuss the case. There is also a Colonial Parkway Murders channel here on YouTube.
I live in the colonial parkway area... Some of us that know family friends to those that lost those people, believe he was caught recently.

Great video, Mary! Very educational. But really sad. 
Still a great quality video, however!
Sad stuff Mary, educational though I guess to us horror fans.. might be more scary if they found the killer! Good stuff
description:
Video Suggested By: Madison Luke
Cover Image by: Danny Vera

Who killed eight couples between 1986 through 1989 along the Colonial Parkway in Virginia?

If you have information that could help the FBI, you can send investigators an email: colonial_parkway_murders@ic.fbi.gov.
